The Quranic researcher has lied to the garbage and returned with the resurrection with the resurrection that brings people to fear, the horrors, and the sky with the tenderness, the breakfast, the land and the mountain With the amplitude and the affirmation, and put it on the position of the inauguration of the right to the significance in the sense of the lot, and it is the harm of anything in which it is tightened to its hearts.And the sentence is a marketer for some of the conditions of his right to him, peace and blessings be upon him As if it was said and what I realized is what the right is lied to it, then they were returned, and they were killed.
